ygData.subject: Re: Where is a good place for a lvl 17 to hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: The Karanas Chasm Crawlers, Gorge Hounds, Lion Matriarch and Patriarchs, Borer Beetles, Ghouls - etc. Samiba Craftsman ...
ygData.messageBody:
The Karanas

Chasm Crawlers, Gorge Hounds, Lion Matriarch and Patriarchs, Borer
Beetles, Ghouls - etc.

Samiba Craftsman

--- CMai <CMai@...> wrote:
> Hello Everyone,
>
> I am a lvl 17 bard trying to find a good place to
> hunt. I am mostly around
> Oasis but willing to travel for exp and loot. I
> need a good place with
> decent amount of plp to group with. I tried Unrest,
> and Highpass. It seems
> that no one wants a bard because we attract too much
> attentions. Please
> give suggestions.
>
> Thnx,
> Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
> Hammerpaw and Samiam
> Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
>
>
>
>

> ATTACHMENT part 2 application/octet-stream name=CMai.vcf
